entry.summary:
RTâ€‚DappaDan (ðŸ¤™ðŸ¾,ðŸ˜œ) Data is cool. Analysis is better. Insights from people actually doing the "thing" is priceless. There aren't many groups like @riseinweb3 consistently bringing new devs into Web3. Listen when they speak.
gulcan yayla:â€‚Established web3 developers went up from 1k in 2018 to 8k+ in 2023 according to the latest Electric Capital Dev Report. In those 5 years, 230k+ newcomers contributed to projects. If we all did a slightly better job in retaining these newcomers, we could easily have many moreâ€¦
